headline: Global Shift Toward Trust: 2025 Employer Branding Creativity Awards Highlight New Talent Trends
summary: As global competition for talent intensifies, organisations are increasingly elevating employer branding from a recruitment-focused activity to a core strategic capability. Authentic storytelling, employee-experience design and trust-building have become defining components of modern organisational competitiveness.
